title: 2 bed/2 bath with 2 heated garage spots
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
My husband and I are renting our 2 bed/2 bath with 2 heated garage spots in West Town starting July 1st!
Please shoot me a note if you or someone you know someone who is interested!
Newly updated with new floors and appliances in this this 2 bed/2 bath West Town condo with 2 indoor garage parking spots in an elevator building.
East facing primary bedroom with skyline views of the John Hancock building includes walk-in closet and ensuite bath with jacuzzi tub, stand up shower, and double vanity sinks.
Spacious second bedroom has wall-to-wall closet space and can easily fit a queen bed and desk.
Kitchen has all updated appliances, granite countertops, and great storage.
Open floor plan great for entertaining with south and east skyline window views in the living room.
Easily accessible to public transportation, the Grand Blue Line stop, and the 65 bus.
Walking distance to Fulton Market and Randolph Street restaurants.
Cable/HBO/Showtime/Internet and 2 heated garage spots included in the rent.
